text: He imanadaragana!Tomara anugrahera katha prakasa kare ebam kasta diye nijedera dana khayarata barabada karo na se byaktira mata ye nijera dhana-sampada loka dekhanora uddesye byaya kare ebam allaha o parakalera prati bisbasa rakhe na. Ata'eba, e byaktira drstanta ekati masrna patharera mata yara upara kichu mati parechila. Atahpara era upara prabala brsti barsita halo, anantara take sampurna pariskara kare dila. Tara ai bastura kona sa'oyaba paya na, ya tara uparjana kareche. Allaha kaphera sampradayake patha pradarsana karena na.
